weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon bathes the city in a soft, radiant clarity, as the sun stretches its golden fingers across the skyline. The forecast promises temperatures hovering around 56, gradually descending to a cozy 54, with a gentle west wind rustling through the streets. While the air remains invigorating, it's a good moment to steer clear of heavier jackets; a light sweater or a long-sleeve shirt will provide comfort against the subtle chill that often linger in this coastal jewel.

As twilight approaches, hints of patchy fog may weave through the air, adding a touch of mystery, but it won’t obscure the enchanting views of the Golden Gate or the iconic silhouettes of the city. Embrace the serenity of this fading day; take a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, sip a hot beverage at a cozy café, or simply find a peaceful spot in one of the city’s verdant parks to reflect and unwind. The gentle ebb and flow of the evening will cradle you into a tranquil night as the skies gradually darken into a canvas of muted blues and silvers.
